welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Little Falls, where the breathtaking views of the Mohawk River and our charming historic buildings will surely enchant you. Get ready to immerse yourself in our quaint city known for its rich history and vibrant community. We can't wait for you to explore and experience all that Little Falls has to offer!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport is exclusively for private flights and offers a luxurious and comfortable experience.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Municipal Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, serving mainly domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, serving mainly international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the WiFi network for free for up to 30 minutes.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linden Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Linden Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves domestic flights and is home to Delta Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves both domestic and international flights and is home to American Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights and is home to United Airlines.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at JFK, primarily used by international airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used by Delta Air Lines and its partners.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The largest and newest terminal at JFK, used by a variety of international airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: A modern terminal used exclusively by JetBlue Airways.

terminals.name: Terminal 7
terminals.description: A terminal used by several international airlines, including British Airways and Qantas.

terminals.name: Terminal 8
terminals.description: A terminal used by American Airlines and its partners.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require re-connection in different areas.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to private jet services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
